mapper.select: SELECT bs.branch_id AS branchId, b.branch_name AS branchName, bs.booking_count AS bookingCount FROM booking_stats bs JOIN branch b ON bs.branch_id = b.branch_id ORDER BY bs.booking_count DESC LIMIT #{limit}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO booking_stats (branch_id, booking_count, last_updated) VALUES (#{branchId}, #{bookingCount}, NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE booking_stats SET booking_count = #{bookingCount}, last_updated = NOW() WHERE branch_id = #{branchId}
